explains: adj. 高兴的，令人愉快的

sentences.en: The end of the joyous day had come.
The world seemed so joyous and wonderful all of a sudden.
sentences.cn: 突然间，整个世界似乎变得如此欢乐和美妙。

sentences.en: Wendy, who saw that they must break the joyous news more gently, had a better plan.
sentences.cn: 温迪觉得他们必须把这个令人高兴的消息更温柔地说出来，她有了一个更好的计划。
